functions.tag: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Sealed Blood Vial\",\"color\":\"dark_red\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"Blood clinics would extract blood","color":"gray"}','{"text":"from people and store them in these","color":"gray"}','{"text":"vials, which were then used for","color":"gray"}','{"text":"energy transfusions and dangerous","color":"gray"}','{"text":"castings.
